protein.specific_function: Cytochrome b5 is a membrane bound hemoprotein which function as an electron carrier for several membrane bound oxygenases

reference.reference_text: Yoo M, Steggles AW: The complete nucleotide sequence of human liver cytochrome b5 mRNA. Biochem Biophys Res Commun. 1988 Oct 14;156(1):576-80.
